pages.text: $(li)Some $(l:patchouli:villagers/fisherman)Fishermans$(/l) can be found sailing the seas in their Fishing Ships in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Maybe you should talk to them, they may want to trade Fish for your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
